body: dilf means daughter id like to fuck...

I hate to do this but I need help.

I'm looking for this story about a school that has this "sex club" and the only way you can have sex is if you have a key with an apple on it.  A new girl comes into the club and the MC basically falls in love with her (he doesn't know he does).  She's petite, has short, black, messy-ish looking hair and usually has a blank look on her face.  Near the end, guys from another school get the key, rape the girl in front of MC after he tried to save her, the rapists get caught (and sent to jail?), and the MC is in the hospital.  As she's feeding him he asks if they can go out but she says no, but they can still have sex.

For the life of me I can't remember who made it, I feel like it looked like Cuvie's work though...
Pretty sure it means daughter I'd like fucking lol
